alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lancaster and southwestern Saunders Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 519 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valparaiso, or 16 miles southwest of Wahoo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ceresco around 535 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ithaca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
